title: AI Assemblies Workshop
description: Between October and December 2023, TW AI Assembly selected four themes after expert interviews and topic analysis, and successfully held four deliberative democracy workshops and three expert forums, totaling more than 400 Participants provided more than 2,000 opinions. These workshops covered topics ranging from the development and governance of language models (Taipei session) to strengthening patient-centered medical care (Kaohsiung session).

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: The development of AI technology has had a profound impact on the field of education, and this responsibility ultimately falls on the shoulders of our generation. As AI technology advances, it will inevitably enter campuses and change traditional education models. When discussing the educational landscape of the next five years, we find that many pioneers in the AI field have already begun exploring how to apply these technologies in education. The efforts of these pioneers provide us with valuable experience and direction, but how these technologies will ultimately develop and be applied still requires the collective effort and responsibility of our generation. What the future educational landscape will look like, we hope to see a more intelligent and personalized learning environment, which is also the goal we strive for.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
The application of AI in the field of education has sparked widespread discussion and anticipation. Many educators and students hope that AI can promote learning and growth. However, in reality, students have doubts about the practicality and interest of the courses. Some students believe that the course content does not meet their needs and even feel that learning is useless. This reflects that educational methods need to be more practical and targeted.

Students are the group with the most time and potential to learn new knowledge, but their motivation and engagement in learning are not necessarily high. How to make students understand and be motivated to participate in learning is a challenge. Course design should consider students' interests and actual needs and be able to stimulate their thinking and creativity.

In addition, interdisciplinary learning and collaboration are also considered important directions for future education. People from different professional backgrounds working together can inspire more innovation and valuable outcomes. Education should not be merely a one-way transmission of knowledge but a process of multi-party participation and mutual growth.

In this process, AI can play an important role. AI can not only provide personalized learning plans but also help students understand their learning status through assessments. However, the application of AI needs to be cautious to ensure that it truly enhances learning outcomes rather than becoming a mere formal tool.

Overall, the combination of AI and education is full of potential but also faces challenges. Educators need to continuously explore and practice to find the most suitable teaching models and tools, allowing students to truly benefit from learning.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In modern education, AI technology is gradually being introduced to enhance the efficiency and fairness of educational assessments. AI can assist teachers in grading assignments and exams, especially in more standardized tests, saving a significant amount of time. However, for content that requires higher subjective judgment, such as essays, AI's grading still relies on teachers' experience for final confirmation. This hybrid grading model, where the machine performs an initial assessment followed by a teacher's review, can reduce grading bias to some extent and ensure fairness and impartiality in grading.

Moreover, the application of AI in educational assessments also faces some challenges. For instance, in large-scale exams or highly interactive tests, the application of AI is more difficult. However, in classroom quizzes or in-class tests, AI has more opportunities for application and can better assist teachers in the assessment process.

In the future, with technological advancements, AI is expected to play a more significant role in educational assessments, providing higher quality grading standards, reducing grading discrepancies among teachers, and more accurately reflecting students' learning outcomes. Nevertheless, this process still needs to consider individual differences among students and teachers' professional judgment to ensure the comprehensiveness and accuracy of the assessment results.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
The integration of AI and education, especially in the field of educational technology, is gradually changing the way we learn. AI technology can not only enhance learning efficiency but also save time, making educational resources more accessible. Nowadays, the development of educational technology requires appropriate equipment and software and hardware support. These devices, including advanced technologies like VR, can provide a more immersive learning experience. Additionally, the promotion of educational technology also needs suitable vendors and sponsors to support the construction of its infrastructure.

In this digital age, learning channels are diversified, and digital resources such as e-books are becoming increasingly popular, with some even available for free. However, effectively utilizing these resources remains a significant challenge. In the next five years, the development of educational technology will become more specialized and personalized, allowing students to obtain more customized learning experiences through AI technology.

Overall, the integration of AI and education will bring unprecedented convenience and efficiency, and with continuous technological advancements, the scope and depth of educational technology applications will continue to expand.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In Taiwan, the application of AI in the field of education has shown great potential, especially in language learning and personalized learning plans. Taiwan has a rich resource of indigenous languages, and through large language models (LLM), these rare languages can be more easily preserved and utilized. Additionally, AI technology can help teachers reduce administrative burdens, provide personalized learning plans, and adjust according to students' learning progress and needs, thereby enhancing teaching effectiveness.

The application of AI in education also includes speech recognition and language learning, which can help students better master language skills. AI can also generate teaching materials, provide real-time learning feedback, and automatically adjust teaching content based on students' performance. Furthermore, AI technology can be used in psychological companion robots to provide emotional support to students, especially in resource-limited situations, reducing the workload of psychological counselors.

In the classroom, AI can help teachers design icebreaker games to enhance classroom interaction, automatically generate course outlines and related materials, and facilitate lesson preparation. AI technology can also assist teachers in differentiated instruction, providing personalized teaching plans based on students' different needs, thereby improving learning outcomes.

Overall, the application of AI in education can not only improve teaching efficiency but also provide more diverse learning resources, helping students better master knowledge and skills. With continuous technological advancements, the prospects for AI applications in the field of education will become even broader.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: The application of AI in the field of education and training is becoming increasingly widespread, especially in medical education, where the integration of AI technology and standardized training has become an important issue. By incorporating it into the curriculum, AI education and training can help students learn new knowledge from a practical distance, enhancing learning outcomes. Institutions such as KMU (Kaohsiung Medical University) are also improving faculty levels and discussing how to better utilize AI technology to assist medical student training, particularly in areas like emotional processing. In the next five years, more applications of AI technology will be seen in educational settings, which will not only reduce the burden on teachers and students but also provide a more interesting and effective learning experience. Over the past few months, there have been about three hundred AI courses on the Accupace platform, covering various topics such as the use of prompts, demonstrating the diversity and potential of AI education and training. Integrating standardized AI education and training is crucial for the continuous learning and advancement of doctors and other professionals.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In today's education and career development, the application of AI technology is gradually becoming a focal point. As society's demand for versatile talents increases, the education system faces new challenges and opportunities. Versatile talents refer to individuals with multiple skills and interdisciplinary knowledge, who will be more competitive in the future job market. Many companies, such as NTT and APP, emphasize the need for more of these versatile talents to meet the rapidly changing market demands.

However, in reality, educational resources are limited, and teachers face the dilemma of low salaries and high work pressure, making it difficult for them to cultivate students' diverse abilities. Additionally, many students consider future return on investment and work pressure when choosing a career, which also affects their motivation and direction in learning.

The introduction of AI technology is expected to change this situation. Through the application of AI, education can become more personalized and efficient, helping students better adapt to future job market demands. AI can not only enhance learning efficiency but also reduce the burden on teachers, giving them more time and energy to focus on teaching innovation.

In summary, the integration of AI and education will play an important role in the future, especially in cultivating versatile talents. The education system needs to adapt to this change and actively explore the application of AI technology to meet the future job market's demand for diverse skills and interdisciplinary knowledge.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
The application of AI in the field of education is gradually becoming an important issue. Many people hope to convey the concept of AI to students on multiple levels, so they have a correct perception of AI. Discussions on AI-assisted teaching and replacing some teacher roles are also ongoing, but this requires students to have the ability to judge the correctness of AI-generated results. Schools and educational institutions need to work together to implement AI on campuses and enhance AI education training for teachers.

Currently, many school systems and teachers are not fully prepared to face the challenges of AI, so more information and training are needed to improve their skills. Cross-disciplinary collaboration and data structuring are key to AI learning, which requires everyone's participation and behavior change, a willingness to try AI, and provide feedback.

Additionally, the education departments and schools hope to spread such discussions to involve more people. Students should start engaging with AI from the basic education stage to cultivate interest and skills in AI. This is not just about technical learning but also includes education on ethics and digital literacy, making students aware of the importance of protecting personal data and image rights.

Overall, the application of AI in education requires joint efforts from multiple parties, from enhancing teacher training to changing students' learning methods, from technical training to ethical education. This is a comprehensive and ongoing process. Taiwan's education system needs to accelerate its pace to embrace the arrival of the AI era.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In the current field of education, the introduction of AI technology has brought new opportunities and challenges to teacher education. Many schools hope to increase training in this area so that teachers can more effectively use AI technology to improve teaching quality. However, it is a daunting task for teachers to ensure that students not only understand the course content but are also inspired and actively engaged.

The cultivation of AI teaching staff requires a dual approach, enhancing teachers' professional knowledge and developing their instructional design capabilities. This way, in future teaching scenarios, teachers will be able to flexibly use AI technology and guide students in deep learning.

During the teaching process, each group or table needs clear guidance; otherwise, it is easy to reach an impasse. Teachers need to have the ability to design teaching strategies and collaborate with parents to provide more comprehensive educational plans. Additionally, planning and implementing remedial teaching is an indispensable part.

Overall, the education field urgently needs talents with design thinking. This design not only refers to programming but also includes teaching strategies and curriculum design. Only in this way can the potential of AI technology be fully realized in future education, achieving more efficient and inspiring teaching.

However, after I carefully examined the data, it actually shows that the good are getting better, but the weak are also improving. It actually widens the gap.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In modern educational evaluation, AI technology has begun to play an important role, assisting in data integration and improving the accuracy of evaluations. Teachers use AI to process large amounts of data during evaluations, which not only increases efficiency but also makes the results more objective. However, this has also sparked some discussions, such as whether the evaluation process should be made more natural to avoid over-reliance on technology.

In the educational field, teachers need to record observations and conversations with students every semester. Although these records do not directly affect grades, they may influence teachers' impressions of students. Parents are also increasingly concerned about teachers' teaching conditions and may even review the curriculum to understand the content being taught.

The government invests a large amount of money annually in remedial teaching programs, attempting to narrow the academic gap between students. However, the latest PISA results show a polarization in the academic performance of Taiwanese students. While excellent students are getting better and weaker students are also making progress, the overall gap is still widening.

In summary, the application of AI in educational evaluation brings many conveniences and challenges. How to balance technology with a more humanized evaluation approach remains an important issue for future exploration.

tree.topicShortDescription:
The development of AI technology has had a profound impact on the field of education, and this trend will become more evident in the next five years. Once AI technology enters campuses, it will transform traditional education models, providing a more intelligent and personalized learning environment. Many educators and students are looking forward to the application of AI in education, believing it can promote learning and growth. However, students have concerns about the practicality and interest level of the courses, reflecting the need for more practical and targeted educational methods.

The application of AI in education is extensive, including improving the efficiency and fairness of educational assessments, providing personalized learning plans, generating teaching materials, and offering real-time learning feedback. AI has shown great potential, especially in language learning and personalized learning plans. AI technology can also help teachers reduce administrative burdens, enhance teaching effectiveness, and play a role in psychological companionship and emotional support.

In medical education, the integration of AI technology and standardized training has become an important issue, helping students improve their learning outcomes. The application of AI technology can not only enhance learning efficiency but also reduce the burden on teachers, allowing them more time and energy to focus on teaching innovation. This is particularly important for cultivating dual-skilled talents with multidisciplinary knowledge.

However, the application of AI in education also faces challenges. Teachers and students need to have the ability to judge the correctness of AI-generated results and require more information and training to improve their skills. Cross-disciplinary collaboration and data structuring are key to enabling AI learning, requiring everyone's participation and behavioral changes.

Overall, the combination of AI and education is full of potential but also faces challenges. Educators need to continuously explore and practice to find the most suitable teaching models and tools, allowing students to truly benefit from learning. With continuous technological advancements, the application prospects of AI in the field of education will become broader, providing more diverse learning resources to help students better master knowledge and skills. Taiwan's education system needs to accelerate its pace to embrace the arrival of the AI era.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
AI in healthcare is playing an increasingly important role in modern medical systems, with a wide and diverse range of applications. Firstly, AI can assist doctors in diagnosis and treatment decisions. Through big data analysis and image recognition technology, AI can quickly and accurately assess medical conditions, provide diagnostic suggestions, and alert doctors to issues such as drug allergies or drug interactions. Additionally, AI can play a crucial role in emergency and urgent medical situations. For example, in the management of acute coronary syndrome and myocardial infarction, AI can help medical teams make swift decisions, improving patient survival rates.

In primary care and community outreach, the application of AI is also gradually becoming more widespread. Through telemedicine technology, AI can enable patients in remote areas to receive timely medical services, reducing the problem of uneven distribution of medical resources. AI can also assist nursing staff by reducing tedious paperwork, allowing them to focus on patient care. Moreover, the widespread adoption of AI technology needs to consider the acceptance of patients and their families. Through education and promotion, more people can understand and trust the application of AI in healthcare.

However, the development of AI in healthcare also faces some challenges. Firstly, there are technical and legal issues. AI systems need to comply with local legal regulations and require significant financial investment. Secondly, the design of medical AI needs to consider the needs and habits of users; otherwise, it may not become widespread due to complexity or misalignment with actual needs. Additionally, cross-disciplinary collaboration is a key factor in promoting the development of medical AI. Medical teams need to work with technical experts to truly harness the potential of AI.

In summary, the application prospects of AI in healthcare are broad. From diagnosis and treatment to primary care and community outreach, AI can provide effective support. However, to truly integrate AI into the healthcare system, it is necessary to overcome challenges related to technology, law, and user acceptance. With continuous technological advancements and strengthened cross-disciplinary collaboration, the future healthcare environment will become more efficient and user-friendly with the inclusion of AI.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: The application of medical AI in surgeries is gradually becoming an important part of modern healthcare. Future doctors may carry tablets or have robotic assistance to enhance the accuracy of diagnosis and treatment. AI technology can analyze images in real-time at emergency scenes, assisting medical personnel in more precise triage. Although surgeons will not be completely replaced in the short term, AI-assisted robots can reduce risks and increase success rates in high-error surgeries. AI can also analyze a patient's condition before surgery, providing the best surgical plan and predicting success rates. Robots can replace assistants during surgery, reducing chaos and errors, and making quick judgments in emergencies. However, AI and robots still need to follow standard operating procedures (SOP) to avoid affecting professional judgment. The development of communication technology will also optimize telemedicine, further improving the efficiency and quality of medical services. Overall, the application of AI in surgeries will become an important auxiliary tool in the medical field, enhancing the precision and success rates of surgeries.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: The development of medical AI has sparked high expectations for reducing the workload of healthcare personnel. Many healthcare workers hope that AI can reduce the time spent on clinical work and tedious administrative tasks, such as medical record entry and medication distribution, allowing them to focus on core medical care tasks. The application of AI may also include speech-to-text technology to help doctors record cases more quickly and provide support in scanning and diagnosis, reducing the fatigue of continuous work. However, the design of AI must be cautious to ensure it truly simplifies processes rather than adding to the burden of frontline staff. Although AI has the potential to significantly reduce the working hours of healthcare personnel, some people are still concerned about the loss of job rights and the risk of being replaced. Therefore, the promotion of AI requires strong support from hospitals and schools, and healthcare workers need to feel the practical convenience and efficiency improvements it brings to truly achieve the simplification and ease of medical work.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In the modern medical environment, the application of AI technology is gradually transforming medical practices. Through discussions with senior practitioners in the medical field, we have learned about their expectations and challenges regarding AI. Medical personnel are often busy with tedious and repetitive tasks, which are not only inefficient but also affect their ability to focus on patient care. AI can help in this regard by detecting errors and standardizing processes, reducing the working hours of healthcare workers, improving diagnostic efficiency, and preventing misdiagnoses.

However, the medical environment is overly specialized, leading to inconsistent treatment methods for patients across different departments, causing confusion for patients. The integration and standardization of AI can improve this issue, making medical services more patient-centered. Professionals from different fields and stages working together are expected to turn these visions into reality, improving the overall medical environment.

Additionally, AI can assist doctors in joint consultations, comparing previous cases to provide more evidence-based judgments. Such technological applications can not only enhance medical efficiency but also reduce human errors. However, AI cannot completely replace human thinking; it can only provide suggestions, and the final decisions still need to be made by medical professionals.

In promoting smart healthcare, communication and resource integration are crucial. The integration of systems between different hospitals and the opinions of primary care personnel need to be valued. Future healthcare should be human-centered, patient-centered, and emphasize the importance of preventive medicine. This requires a collective effort to achieve a more core and humane social healthcare system.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
Medical AI plays an increasingly important role in modern healthcare systems, but the accompanying issues of medical information and privacy have also raised widespread concerns. Firstly, translation errors and information confusion can lead to biases in medical decisions, posing potential threats to patient health. Additionally, legally obtaining patient data and performing de-identification are key to protecting patient privacy, but current laws and regulations still need further improvement to ensure the security and confidentiality of patient data during use.

The use of sensitive information such as patient medical history and medication history also needs to be clearly defined to avoid excessive access to this data, thereby reducing the risk of privacy breaches. The enhancement of databases and computing capabilities is fundamental to the development of medical AI, but this also requires higher data protection measures. The trust of patients and their families in the use of data is a crucial factor in promoting the widespread adoption of medical AI. Therefore, a comprehensive set of standard operating procedures (SOP) must be established to address situations where patients do not wish their data to appear in the system.

In summary, the application prospects of medical AI are broad, but it must be carried out under the premise of protecting patient privacy and legally obtaining data, so as to truly benefit patients and the healthcare system.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
The development of medical AI has shown great potential in improving medical efficiency and reducing the burden on healthcare workers. Many healthcare workers are currently overwhelmed by heavy administrative paperwork, preventing them from focusing on patient care. By introducing AI technology, these tedious tasks can be effectively replaced, allowing healthcare workers to concentrate on patient care. However, this requires the investment of national resources and interdepartmental coordination, as hospitals and other related institutions like fire departments operate independently, making coordination quite challenging.

In terms of regulations and governance, Taiwan's medical regulations are relatively stringent, with medical accidents potentially facing criminal penalties, which is unique globally. These stringent regulations place immense pressure on healthcare workers when treating patients. Therefore, it is necessary to establish new norms and insurance mechanisms to clearly define the responsibilities of healthcare workers and to compensate for accidents through insurance or relief systems, thereby reducing the legal risks for healthcare workers.

Additionally, promoting the application of medical AI requires patient consent and public trust. The government and relevant institutions should strengthen communication and participation, encouraging contributions from all parties to jointly develop a comprehensive governance framework to ensure that AI technology is applied in the medical field under legal and ethical premises. Only in this way can the true potential of medical AI be realized, benefiting both healthcare workers and patients.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: Medical AI plays an increasingly important role in modern healthcare, but its operation relies on stable hardware and energy supply. In the face of emergencies such as war or energy shortages, the operation of medical AI may be severely affected, leading to interruptions in medical services and the inability to effectively diagnose and treat patients. In addition to energy issues, the hardware equipment, spatial configuration, and material selection of medical AI are also challenges that need to be overcome. These factors collectively determine whether medical AI can operate stably in various environments, ensuring the continuity and reliability of medical services. Therefore, addressing these issues is crucial for enhancing the effectiveness of medical AI applications.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: In the application of medical AI, medical information security is a crucial component. The stability of the system directly affects the quality of medical services, especially in large hospitals where a stable system environment is essential. The stability of 5G networks and the reliability of information transmission have a significant impact on patient survival rates. Ensuring the stable operation of these technologies not only enhances the efficiency of medical services but also safeguards patient safety and health. Therefore, maintaining high stability in networks and information transmission within medical AI systems is an important issue that cannot be overlooked in medical information security.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In the development process of medical AI, medical data sharing is a key issue. At present, many medical institutions have not yet established comprehensive data uploading and sharing mechanisms, lacking standardized operating procedures (SOPs). This leads to difficulties in database integration when introducing intelligent or AI systems, and may even result in data gaps. Patient privacy is also a major challenge. Although patients have the right to take their medical records, there is currently no complete mechanism for patients to choose whether to upload their data to the system.

Cross-domain cooperation and information integration are key to solving these problems. Unified data input and continuously integrated databases can allow hospitals nationwide to share best practices, avoiding the development of redundant systems. The government should play an important role in this regard, providing reasonable policies and guidance to ensure the security and effectiveness of data sharing.

In addition, medical AI systems require strong backend support to effectively process and analyze big data. Through AI technology, doctors can extract similar cases from the database to assist in diagnosis and treatment decisions. However, all of this is premised on data standardization and sharing; otherwise, AI systems will not be able to perform as expected.

In summary, medical data sharing is the cornerstone of promoting the development of medical AI. It requires comprehensive mechanisms, standardized processes, and cross-domain cooperation to truly achieve the goal of smart healthcare.

claims.claim: Can AI results be trusted?

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In the development of medical AI, the attribution of AI medical responsibility has become an important issue. Current liability regulations typically place the blame for errors in the diagnostic process on physicians, which increases the pressure on them when dealing with AI technology. Many physicians worry that AI will replace their jobs, especially those professionals who rely on experience and intuition in the diagnosis and treatment process. However, surgeons believe they will not be completely replaced by AI in the short term, as surgery requires a high level of skill and real-time decision-making ability.

Some physicians have a defensive attitude towards AI; they want to understand how to maintain their advantage in the competition with AI rather than being replaced. This mindset reflects the complex emotions within the medical community towards AI technology: a mix of anticipation and concern. Medical institutions should view AI as an auxiliary tool rather than pushing physicians to the forefront to bear all the risks and responsibilities.

Additionally, the reliability of AI diagnostic results is also a matter of concern. Both physicians and patients need to have sufficient trust in AI results to truly apply them in clinical practice. Therefore, establishing a clear mechanism for responsibility attribution and a trust system is key to promoting the development of medical AI.

tree.topicShortDescription:
Medical AI plays an increasingly important role in modern healthcare systems, with a wide and diverse range of applications. AI technology can assist doctors in making diagnostic and treatment decisions. Through big data analysis and image recognition technology, AI can quickly and accurately assess medical conditions, provide diagnostic suggestions, and alert doctors to issues such as drug allergies or drug interactions. In emergency and urgent medical situations, AI can also play a crucial role in improving patient survival rates.

In primary healthcare and community outreach, the application of AI is gradually becoming widespread. Through telemedicine technology, patients in remote areas can receive timely medical services, reducing the problem of uneven distribution of medical resources. AI can also help nursing staff reduce tedious paperwork, allowing them to focus on patient care. However, the widespread adoption of AI technology requires consideration of patient and family acceptance. Through education and promotion, more people can understand and trust the application of AI in healthcare.

In surgical applications, AI technology can enhance the accuracy of diagnosis and treatment, assist medical staff in more precise triage, and reduce risks in high-error-rate surgeries, thereby increasing success rates. AI can also analyze a patient's condition before surgery, provide the best surgical plan and predict success rates, and act as an assistant during surgery to reduce errors. However, AI and robots must still follow standard operating procedures (SOP) to avoid affecting professional judgment.

The development of medical AI has also raised high expectations for reducing the workload of healthcare workers. AI can reduce the time spent on clinical work and tedious administrative tasks, allowing healthcare workers to focus on core medical care tasks. However, the design of AI must be careful to ensure it truly simplifies processes rather than adding to the burden of frontline staff. Promoting the application of AI requires strong support from hospitals and schools, and healthcare workers must feel the practical convenience and efficiency improvements it brings.

The development of medical AI also faces several challenges, including technical and legal issues, user needs and habits, and the importance of cross-disciplinary collaboration. AI systems need to comply with local legal regulations and require significant financial investment. Medical teams need to collaborate with technical experts to fully realize the potential of AI.

Additionally, medical information and privacy issues are major challenges. Legally obtaining patient data and de-identifying it is key to protecting patient privacy. Current laws and regulations still need further improvement. The use of sensitive information such as patient medical history and medication history also needs clear definition to avoid excessive access to this data, thereby reducing the risk of privacy breaches.

The operation of medical AI relies on stable hardware equipment and energy supply. In the face of emergencies such as war or energy shortages, the operation of medical AI may be severely affected. Furthermore, medical data sharing is a critical issue. Many medical institutions have not yet established comprehensive data upload and sharing mechanisms and lack standardized operating procedures (SOP). Cross-domain collaboration and information integration are key to solving these problems.

Finally, the attribution of responsibility for AI in healthcare has become an important issue. Current liability regulations typically attribute errors in the diagnostic and treatment process to doctors, which increases the pressure on doctors when facing AI technology. Establishing a clear responsibility attribution mechanism and trust system is key to promoting the development of medical AI.

In summary, the application prospects of medical AI are broad. From diagnosis and treatment to primary healthcare and community outreach, AI can provide effective support. However, to truly integrate AI into the healthcare system, it is necessary to overcome challenges in technology, law, and user acceptance. With continuous technological advancement and strengthened cross-disciplinary collaboration, the future healthcare environment will become more efficient and friendly with the inclusion of AI.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: In modern society, the development and innovation of media play a crucial role. Media is not only a tool for information dissemination but also an important platform for cultural exchange and social observation. Through media, we can gain a deeper understanding of different social phenomena and promote cultural diversity and inclusiveness. The innovation and development of media, whether in terms of breakthroughs in form or enrichment of content, provide us with more diverse perspectives and broader sources of information. These innovative media forms not only enhance our efficiency in obtaining information but also allow us to more comprehensively observe and understand social changes and cultural evolution. Overall, the development of media has a profound impact on the observation of society and culture, and it is worth our continuous attention and exploration.

This background difference gives them different perspectives and creativity when it comes to digital technology and culture. College students and temporary workers in the team have come up with many innovative ideas, showcasing the power of multiculturalism. Additionally, with the increase in immigration, society needs to establish more ethical norms and gradually transform into a multicultural society that is no longer dominated by a single ethnic group. These changes and challenges are a true reflection of the diversity and cultural integration in modern society.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In a discussion on society and culture, participants emphasized the importance of social participation and shared their experiences and insights. It was mentioned that whether they are students, people from different professions, or various age groups, they can engage in meaningful exchanges from diverse perspectives. Even silence was seen as a form of participation. Participants believed that through such discussions and deliberation processes, more connections and understanding could be fostered, making everyone feel the importance of being noticed and understood.

A low-income single mother, after participating in the discussion, felt for the first time that she could speak up for herself and that her words were recorded and valued, which made her feel unprecedented respect and recognition. This experience made participants realize that social participation not only brings personal growth but also promotes social harmony and progress.

The discussion also mentioned that the organizers hope such discussions can spread, allowing more people to participate and continue such exchanges in different settings, such as families, workplaces, or public workshops. Participants also began to exchange information and hoped to bring these experiences and insights back to share with more people, further promoting social progress.

In summary, the discussion highlighted the diversity and importance of social participation. Whether through speaking or silence, everyone can find their place in such processes and, through mutual sharing and understanding, promote the common progress of society.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In modern society, the thoughts and perspectives of the younger generation often reflect the mindset we had when we were young, which is particularly evident among student groups. Digital immigrants have received digital assistance in this process, and this support has made them feel very grateful and touched. People from different fields and levels can open up new spaces through communication, promoting mutual understanding and cooperation. The acceptance of technology and changes in interpersonal relationships are often interconnected, and these changes may lead to a certain degree of alienation.

In this context, some people believe that our way of communication is like chanting spells, a metaphor that reflects the importance of language and expression. Despite the population decline, those who remain are often the ones truly suited to this environment. People raise issues from different perspectives and reach solutions through consensus, which is an important social dynamic.

Our nature may lead to certain social phenomena, so a platform is needed to help us organize and understand these phenomena. Finally, using more down-to-earth vocabulary to describe and communicate these issues can make discussions more relatable and promote more effective communication.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: In the context of Taiwan's society and culture, social participation and the process of democratization are particularly important. The exchange of diverse opinions can inspire more possibilities for future development, and this diversity of voices provides a rich soil for social innovation. Through more social activities, people can engage in in-depth discussions with colleagues and family members, which not only promotes understanding and cooperation among individuals but also helps to create a more inclusive social atmosphere. However, Taiwan's management model is still accustomed to a top-down approach, which to some extent limits grassroots participation and autonomy. To achieve true democratization, adjustments must be made in both the system and culture to encourage more social participation, thereby promoting comprehensive social progress.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In modern society, the rapid development of technology has brought many conveniences, but it has also raised concerns about the disappearance of human touch. As cold, unfeeling machines gradually replace human jobs, the warmth of interpersonal relationships seems to be fading as well. This phenomenon of technological indifference has led people to reflect on whether we should return to our original nature and intentions, valuing genuine connections between people.

Moreover, the advancement of technology has also brought changes to social structures, particularly concerning those who are left behind. Providing systematic care for these individuals has become an important issue. If professional knowledge and technology are controlled solely by large corporations and governments, it could lead to collusion, further exacerbating social inequality. In such a scenario, social stability could also be threatened, leading to greater chaos.

Against this backdrop, the concept of the rule of law also needs to be re-examined. Especially in different cultural and linguistic contexts, the understanding and practice of the rule of law may vary. Discussions on these issues require more communication and participation, rather than having the fate of the majority decided by a few, which could otherwise lead to more social problems and dissatisfaction.

In summary, while the development of technology has brought many conveniences, it also requires us to re-examine the importance of human touch and social ethics, ensuring that in the pursuit of progress, we do not forget the warmth of interpersonal relationships and social fairness and justice.

claims.claim: Social media platforms are the inevitable outcome of development.
claims.quote: After the appearance of the mediator, it eventually became our current social media platform.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In modern society, the emergence and popularization of social media platforms have had a profound impact on society and culture. These platforms, as a new medium, have changed the way people interact and communicate. In the past, people mainly relied on face-to-face communication or traditional media to obtain information and establish social relationships. However, with the rise of social media platforms, they have become an indispensable part of people's daily lives, whether it is sharing life moments, participating in public discussions, or building and maintaining social networks, these digital platforms are essential.

Social media platforms have not only changed the way individuals interact but also impacted the entire social culture. They provide an open space where people from different backgrounds and perspectives can freely communicate, promoting the integration and collision of diverse cultures. At the same time, these platforms have also become important drivers of social movements and public issues, with many social changes and cultural trends rapidly spreading and diffusing through these platforms.

However, the popularization of social media platforms has also brought some challenges and problems. For example, information overload, the spread of fake news, and privacy issues pose new challenges to society and individuals. How to effectively address the negative impacts while enjoying the convenience and opportunities brought by these platforms has become an important issue that modern society needs to face.

In summary, as a new type of medium in modern society, social media platforms have profoundly influenced people's lifestyles and social culture. They are important tools for promoting social progress and cultural exchange, but they also present new challenges that need to be cautiously addressed.

tree.topicShortDescription:
In modern society, the rapid development of media and digital technology has had a profound impact on society and culture. Media is not only a tool for information dissemination but also an important platform for cultural exchange and social observation. Through media innovation and development, we can gain a deeper understanding of different social phenomena and promote cultural diversity and inclusiveness. The widespread use of digital technology has brought about the integration and collision of diverse cultures. The background differences between digital natives and digital immigrants within teams inspire different perspectives and creativity, showcasing the power of multiculturalism.

Social participation is particularly important in modern society. Whether students, people from different professions, or age groups, meaningful exchanges can be conducted from diverse perspectives. This participation not only brings personal growth but also promotes social harmony and progress. In Taiwan's social and cultural context, social participation and the democratization process are especially important. The exchange of diverse opinions can stimulate more possibilities for future development and promote comprehensive social progress.

Community and local participation have become important elements in promoting social cohesion. Many community activities are led by teachers, providing a platform for academic exchange and becoming important places for students to form emotional connections. These activities enhance interpersonal relationships and increase the sense of social participation. As community activities continue to improve in the future, it is expected that more people will get involved, promoting social harmony and development.

However, the rapid development of technology has also raised concerns about the disappearance of humanization. As machines gradually replace human jobs, the warmth of interpersonal relationships seems to be gradually fading. This phenomenon of technological indifference has led people to reflect on whether we should value real connections between people. Additionally, the advancement of technology has brought changes to social structures, especially for those who are marginalized. Providing systematic care for these groups has become an important issue.

The emergence and popularization of social platforms have had a profound impact on society and culture, changing the way people interact and communicate, and promoting the integration and collision of diverse cultures. However, these platforms also bring challenges such as information overload, the spread of fake news, and privacy issues. How to effectively address the negative impacts while enjoying the convenience and opportunities these platforms bring has become an important issue that modern society needs to face.

Overall, the development of media and digital technology has a profound impact on the observation of society and culture, deserving our continuous attention and discussion. Through the integration of diverse cultures, the promotion of social participation, and reflection on technological development, we can promote social harmony and progress, achieving a more inclusive and just society.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In today's rapidly developing technological era, technical challenges have become a significant issue faced by various industries. Firstly, the architecture design of AI technology is crucial; without a comprehensive design, AI cannot truly perform its intended functions. Additionally, mindset shifts and technology acceptance are key factors in driving technological progress. Many startups fail to sustain themselves after developing new features due to rapid market changes, reflecting the high risk and uncertainty of technological development.

Return on investment is another important consideration. Technological development requires substantial capital investment, making it a major challenge to secure funding effectively. Taiwan also faces challenges in hardware equipment and network infrastructure, especially in meeting future demands for big data and 5G network speeds. Whether the existing capacity is sufficient to handle these demands still requires further evaluation.

Moreover, the stability and reliability of AI technology are significant issues, particularly in emergency situations. For instance, if a machine operated by a firefighter is not stable enough, it could lead to serious consequences. Although blockchain technology offers traceability, its decentralized nature also brings new challenges.

In summary, technical challenges are not just about the technology itself but also involve mindset shifts, capital investment, infrastructure, and market changes. Integrating vast resources and finding a balance among these challenges is key to future technological development.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In today's rapidly developing technological era, the application of technology faces numerous challenges and opportunities. Firstly, voice network technology has demonstrated its powerful potential, allowing people to feel its energy. However, the application of technology is not limited to a single field; cross-disciplinary integration and standardization have become key. Whether it is the application of voltage in the medical field or the speed and database capacity of cloud technology, efficient process management and burden reduction are required.

In the process of technology application, internal collaboration within organizations and cross-domain cooperation are crucial. Integrating and standardizing technologies from different fields can enhance overall efficiency and accuracy. This requires a framework that encompasses consensus from all parties and clearly defines responsibilities, thereby achieving rapid and precise technology application.

Additionally, the combination of open-source and closed-source technologies is also a major challenge. How to collaborate through open-source and closed-source methods at different levels and tiers has become an important issue in technology application. The emergence of Web3 technology provides new ideas for solving these problems. Web3 is not just about cryptocurrencies; it also includes various cryptography-related tools that can help achieve greater control and security.

In the digital world, the application of AI technology is also continuously being explored. AI, as a programmable digital model, can solve problems that are difficult to coordinate in real life. Through open-source platforms such as Stable Diffusion and Hugging Face, the optimization and application of technology have become faster and more flexible.

In summary, the challenge of technology application lies in how to efficiently integrate technologies from different fields and enhance overall performance through standardization and collaboration. At the same time, the combination of open-source and closed-source technologies, as well as the application of Web3 technology, provides new directions and solutions for future technological development.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In modern society, the application of technology has permeated all aspects of our lives, bringing both convenience and challenges. Take family group chats as an example. When we engage in extensive communication within the group, we often cannot review all messages due to limited time. To address this issue, technology can provide a solution by automatically summarizing important content in the group, allowing us to quickly grasp key information.

However, the application of technology is not achieved overnight. In practice, we need to validate the proposed solutions to ensure that these technologies can indeed solve the problems we face. This process includes testing and evaluating various solutions to confirm their effectiveness and reliability. Only through such rigorous validation can we ensure the successful application of technology and truly enhance our quality of life.

In summary, the application of technology demonstrates its potential in solving everyday problems, but it also emphasizes the importance of validation and testing. Through continuous validation and improvement, we can ensure that technology truly meets our needs and brings tangible benefits.

claims.claim: Interdisciplinary communication can promote innovation and understanding.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: Technology and innovation play a crucial role in modern society, and communication between people from different fields and levels is a key factor in driving these technologies and innovations. When professionals from various fields can engage in deep communication and collaboration, it often opens up many new possibilities and opportunities, creating astonishing results. This cross-disciplinary interaction not only facilitates the transfer and integration of knowledge but also inspires more innovative ideas and solutions, thereby promoting further technological development. Through such collaboration, we can collectively face and overcome technical challenges and remain competitive in an ever-changing environment. In summary, cross-disciplinary communication and collaboration are indispensable parts of technological innovation, opening up infinite possibilities and development space for us.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In modern society, the formulation of regulations and policies is particularly important for governing various emerging technologies, especially artificial intelligence (AI). Different regions, such as Europe, may have different regulations for food safety and other fields due to varying local needs that require targeted solutions. For AI governance, the roles of specialized departments and laws are crucial. Laws must not only ensure cybersecurity but also guarantee the transparency and reliability of AI applications.

Policy formulation leads to corresponding regulations that clearly define the forms and timing of AI usage. For example, the European Union has strict prohibitions on AI applications related to psychological manipulation of children. The core of these regulations is how to handle AI governance to protect personal data privacy and security. Before establishing AI regulations, there were already many related regulations such as data governance and cybersecurity, which provide a foundation for AI governance.

The formulation of laws needs to consider multiple demands, including government policies, internal organizational norms, and individual requirements. The transparency and timeliness of laws are also key to ensuring that regulations can be updated and adapted promptly in a rapidly changing technological environment. In summary, the formulation of regulations and policies plays an indispensable role in AI governance, ensuring a balance between technological development and societal needs.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In the rapidly developing field of artificial intelligence (AI), the updating of regulations and policies is particularly important. Existing legal norms often lag behind technological advancements, posing challenges for specialized departments in terms of law and cybersecurity. Deregulation of AI and the formulation of new regulations have become urgent tasks. At this stage, the Executive Yuan has only one draft, highlighting the urgency of regulatory updates.

In this process, relevant laws such as the Personal Data Protection Act, Medical Care Act, and Criminal Code need further improvement to ensure that patients' personal data is fully protected. The formulation of new AI regulations not only needs to consider the direction of technological development but also balance the relationship between privacy protection and innovation. Timely approval and improvement of these regulations will help establish a trustworthy AI application environment.

In summary, updating regulations is key to promoting the healthy development of AI technology. Relevant departments should accelerate their efforts to formulate and improve related laws to address the new challenges and opportunities brought by technology.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In the rapidly developing field of artificial intelligence (AI) today, law and legality have become important issues. Many people claim to be engaged in AI training, but they may actually lack relevant expertise, raising questions about the credibility of AI results. Additionally, when it comes to data usage and privacy protection, legality is an issue that cannot be ignored. Whether the Ministry of Education meets the requirements for information security, privacy notification, and copyright in building the learning history system has become a focus of legal scholars' research.

In terms of legal protection, celebrities like Taylor Swift choose to rely on lawyers to safeguard their rights, even resorting to legal measures to combat infringement. This reflects the importance of law in protecting the interests of individuals and businesses. However, the application and enforcement of the law need to strictly follow relevant regulations to ensure that all actions are legal.

In summary, the development of AI cannot be separated from legal norms and protection. Whether it is data usage, privacy protection, or copyright, it needs to be conducted within a legal framework to ensure the credibility of the technology and the rights of users.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In modern society, regulations and policies play a crucial role in safeguarding individual privacy and data rights. With the advancement of technology, the text comprehension and reasoning abilities of robots are continuously improving, which can be reasonable and beneficial in certain situations. However, if robots replicate and transmit the acquired data in full to others, it may infringe on copyrights and harm the rights of the original creators.

Moreover, the protection of personal data is also an important issue. When data is used, whether individuals are fully informed and have given their consent is key to safeguarding data rights. Regulations should ensure that during the data usage process, individuals' rights to be informed and to consent are respected, thereby effectively protecting personal privacy and preventing data misuse or unauthorized situations.

In summary, regulations and policies should strictly protect personal data and privacy rights while enhancing the application of technology, ensuring that everyone's rights are not violated.

While promoting infrastructure development, the state must ensure that it aligns with modern technology and environmental standards. Developing artificial intelligence (AI) requires substantial resource investment, and the return on these investments is a key factor that decision-makers and government policymakers need to consider. Policy formulation should not only guide the corresponding regulations but also ensure sufficient funding support in areas such as technology investment and healthcare. Funding issues remain a major challenge in various topics. For example, the establishment of the Suhua Department has attracted a large number of tech talents, demonstrating the impact of policy and resource allocation on talent mobility. Therefore, creating a platform for all parties to share ideas and achieving sustainable development through policy guidance and regulation formulation is a crucial issue at present.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: In discussing regulations and policies, especially the process of policy and international trends, we face an important question: should the government take the lead in guiding people to change their behavior, or should the people take the initiative to push the government to make changes? The core of this issue lies in how to effectively achieve social progress and adapt to international trends. The government has the power to formulate and implement policies and can guide changes in social behavior through legislative and administrative means. However, the awareness and initiative of the people are also forces that cannot be ignored. Through civic participation and social movements, people can exert pressure on the government to take necessary reform measures. Therefore, the interaction and cooperation between the government and the people become key factors in promoting policy changes and adapting to international trends. This two-way dynamic mechanism can not only promote the improvement of domestic regulations and policies but also enable us to better respond to the challenges and opportunities brought by globalization.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In the current digital age, data protection and privacy regulations have become a focal point of societal concern. With the rapid development of technology, especially the widespread adoption of artificial intelligence (AI), existing legal frameworks appear outdated and insufficient to address emerging challenges. The protection of patient personal data requires further refinement of current laws to ensure that the ownership of personal data is fully respected and safeguarded.

In the AI era, the formulation of regulations must not only ensure privacy and security but also possess flexibility and foresight to address various potential future scenarios. Standardization and integration are key to achieving this goal, and timely authorization and regulation can more effectively protect personal data rights.

Moreover, how to use laws to govern AI and protect personal data rights has become a topic of joint discussion between the legal and technological communities. This involves not only technical issues but also the formation of social consensus and the impact on economic activities. The Proof of Stake (POS) consensus mechanism of Ethereum provides a reference, demonstrating that in real life, laws and economic activities can achieve more efficient governance models through consensus mechanisms.

Overall, data protection and privacy regulations need to be continuously updated and refined under the dual impetus of technology and law to meet the challenges of the digital age and safeguard everyone's personal data rights.

tree.topicShortDescription:
When discussing regulations and policies, especially regarding the application of artificial intelligence (AI) technology, the existing regulatory framework is considered relatively outdated and unable to fully meet the rapidly evolving technological demands. However, relevant discussions are still ongoing and not entirely lagging behind. To achieve legal and compliant commercial use of small models, mature regulations must support it. These regulations should be formulated by government policymakers, covering foundational work such as education and standardization, and clearly defining the usage scenarios of AI technology to ensure compliance in personal data protection and cybersecurity.

Different regions, such as Europe, have different regulations for AI governance due to varying local needs. Specialized departments and laws play important roles in ensuring cybersecurity, transparency, and reliability. Policy formulation leads to corresponding regulations that clearly define the forms and timing of AI usage. For example, the EU has strict prohibitions on AI applications related to psychological manipulation of children. The formulation of laws needs to consider government policies, internal organizational regulations, and individual-level needs to ensure that regulations can be updated in a timely manner and adapt to the rapidly changing technological environment.

In Taiwan, AI regulations are still in the draft stage, lacking clear guidelines to direct and restrict AI usage. However, there are some related regulations such as data governance, cybersecurity, and digital markets, which can serve as the foundation for AI regulation formulation. The speed of legal regulation often lags behind technological development, making it necessary to ensure legality at every stage when implementing new technologies.

Regulations and policies play a crucial role in protecting personal privacy and data rights. As technology advances, the text comprehension and reasoning abilities of robots continue to improve. However, if robots were to copy and transmit the acquired data verbatim to others, it could infringe on copyrights and harm the rights of original creators. Regulations should ensure that individuals' rights to be informed and to consent are respected during the data usage process, thereby effectively protecting personal privacy.

Against the backdrop of promoting ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance) principles, the formulation of policies and regulations becomes particularly important. While promoting infrastructure development, the state must ensure that it aligns with modern technology and environmental standards. Policy formulation should not only lead to corresponding regulations but also ensure sufficient funding support in areas such as technological investment and healthcare. Establishing a platform for all parties to share ideas and achieving sustainable development through policy guidance and regulation formulation is a current important issue.

In the process of discussing policies and international trends, the interaction and cooperation between the government and the people become key factors in driving policy changes and adapting to international trends. The government has the power to formulate and implement policies, but the awareness and actions of the people are also an indispensable force. Through civic participation and social movements, people can exert pressure on the government, prompting it to take necessary reform measures.

Overall, the formulation of regulations and policies plays an indispensable role in AI governance, ensuring a balance between technological development and societal needs. With in-depth discussions and policy improvements, higher compliance standards are expected to be achieved in the future, ensuring that everyone's rights are not violated.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In today's information and data-driven era, small countries or regions face the risk of data colonization, making data acquisition a significant challenge. As the volume of data increases, capital also surges, enabling better utilization of data. However, the learning process itself is an important database involving a large amount of sensitive personal data, complicating data management and outsourcing issues. Particularly in China, the rapid development of open-source language models often aligns with specific ideologies, challenging the impartiality of data.

In Taiwan, the lack of data, especially Traditional Chinese data, is a pain point for AI development. Local knowledge, while having professional value in fields such as medicine and engineering, can often only be accurately recognized by locals. Data cooperatives, as a mobilization strategy, attempt to address data issues within this framework, promoting data sharing and collaboration. Overall, data issues involve not only technical aspects but also ethical, managerial, and policy considerations.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription:
In today's information and data era, data collection has become the foundation for various applications and research. Whether for planning organizations or AI training, a large and diverse amount of data is needed for support. Legally obtaining data and conducting research and application is a key concern for many Principal Investigators (PIs). The accuracy of AI diagnostic systems relies on the collection and training of large amounts of data to generate results that patients can trust.

During the data collection process, ensuring the professionalism and accuracy of the data is crucial, which requires the involvement of professionals. At the same time, the transparency and traceability of data sources are also key, allowing for effective auditing and verification. Web3 technology provides a new way of sourcing data that can be transparent and verifiable.

Additionally, language models (such as GPT) are very helpful in data collection, but they cannot make predictions, which still relies on training with large databases. To compensate for the lack of corpora, it is sometimes necessary to translate data into English, as English corpora are relatively larger.

Finally, establishing an impartial third-party organization to manage and preserve personal data, with a default organization holding this data from birth, can ensure the security and fairness of the data. These measures and methods together form the foundation of modern data collection, providing solid support for various applications and research.

To reduce paper waste, we can establish a platform that allows everyone to easily output and share ideas, which is not only environmentally friendly but also improves work efficiency. However, the current digitization of data is still insufficient, which is an urgent issue that needs to be addressed. By strengthening efforts in data digitization, we can more effectively manage and utilize these valuable information resources, thereby driving progress and development in various fields.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: In today's era of information and data, data openness has become an important issue. The concept of data openness refers to the idea that anyone can access information publicly, which can promote transparency and innovation. However, in practice, many people may not have the ability to use these open-source data, and even those familiar with platforms like GitHub may not be able to effectively utilize these resources. This reflects a real problem: even if data is open, without the corresponding skills and knowledge, the value of this data is still difficult to fully realize. Additionally, there are various ways to handle data; some people choose to pledge or directly sell the data to certain entities to gain economic benefits. These phenomena highlight the gap between theory and practice in data openness and the challenges that need to be addressed in promoting data openness.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: In today's digital age, the management of information and data privacy protection have become important issues. Continuous data retraining is considered reasonable use, but downloading data may involve copyright issues, deterring many people. To better utilize data, patient data must be de-identified to protect privacy. Web3 technology offers new solutions, such as citizen identity verification and data ownership management, allowing users to prove their identity and protect their privacy when participating in digital platforms. The development of blockchain technology meets social needs for decentralization, censorship resistance, and privacy protection, enabling individuals to better control and own their data. The application and development of these technologies will have a profound impact on data and privacy protection in the future.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: Information and data play a crucial role in modern society, and information security is key to ensuring that this information and data are not stolen or attacked. The main purpose of information security is to prevent unauthorized access and malicious attacks, thereby protecting personal privacy and corporate secrets. This not only includes preventing data theft but also encompasses preventing various forms of attacks, such as cyberattacks and virus intrusions. Effective information security measures can ensure the integrity and accuracy of data, thereby maintaining the stable operation of systems and user trust. In summary, information security is the cornerstone of safeguarding data security and stable operations, and it is vital for both individuals and businesses.

subtopics.subtopicShortDescription: The integration of information and data plays a crucial role in modern society. The concept of integration standardization aims to ensure the accuracy and consistency of data, which is essential for establishing an efficient information system. Information from different fields, such as healthcare and social data, needs to be unified and integrated into a single database for easy access and analysis. This integration is usually carried out in a top-down manner, as it allows for quicker achievement of goals. Integration standardization not only enhances data accuracy but also promotes interoperability between different systems, thereby improving overall operational efficiency.
